Major_Arcs.title: Paul Bunyan and the Circus Strongman
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Paul Bunyan's brief stint with a circus, where he encounters a jealous former strongman, Matto Grasso, and foils his vengeful schemes.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Debut and Local Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan in the circus and the excited reaction of a townsperson to the circus arrival, setting the stage for the circus events.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Paul Bunyan's intervention upon hearing trouble, leading to his first physical confrontation with Billings and his companion.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: Paul Bunyan deals with the pistol threat, questions his assailant, and receives a job offer from the circus owner.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Jealousy and Arson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Matto Grasso's envy and his plan to sabotage Paul Bunyan's performance by setting the circus tent on fire.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and Chase
sub_scenes.description: Matto Grasso's next scheme involves releasing Gigantico, leading to another intervention by Paul Bunyan and a chase.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action

sub_scenes.title: Arena Confrontation and Capture
sub_scenes.description: The chase for Matto Grasso moves into the circus arena, leading to a comical weight-throwing attack and continued pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt

sub_scenes.title: Final Showdown and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: The chase culminates in a physical confrontation, a trapeze bar toss, police intervention, and Paul Bunyan's decision to leave the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Tale
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts one of Marco Polo's adventures in Tibet, involving a supernatural encounter with a talking severed head and a deceptive ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Setting and Gruesome Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure and a man's horrifying discovery of a talking severed head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: Sacred Dagger and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo receives a magical dagger from a rescued man and is directed to Hi-Toun, arriving at a city in mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities

sub_scenes.title: King's Plea and Ominous Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Marco Polo is welcomed by the King and tasked with finding Princess Lotus, leading him to encounter a mourning woman with a sinister home.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus
Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Reveal and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Marco enters the mysterious castle, discovers the woman's true form as an ogress, and faces a threatening confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress

Major_Arcs.title: Prisoners, Ogre, and Magic Knife
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the story of two prisoners captured by an ogre, their discovery of a magic knife, and their subsequent escape and reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Ogre's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the capture of two individuals by a cloaked figure and their subsequent imprisonment by an ogre who threatens to eat them.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: The prisoners discover a hidden knife, use it to defeat the ogre and escape, leading to the woman's joyful reunion with her father.

narrative_arcs.title: The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: Treasure of Agra and Vengeance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of treasure, betrayal, and revenge, starting in a penal colony and culminating in a deadly confrontation in England.

sub_scenes.title: Prologue and Penal Colony Setup
sub_scenes.description: The Treasure Keeper introduces the tale, and the scene shifts to a British penal colony where a prisoner seeks to make a deal.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Vow of Revenge
sub_scenes.description: A prisoner reveals a treasure map to Captain Brooking in exchange for escape, only to be betrayed and vow revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape
Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Deadly Treasure Hunt
sub_scenes.description: Jordan returns to England, finds Captain Brooking, leading to a deadly treasure hunt and a police investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Continued Vigil
Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal
The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Henry Northrup's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, dealing with the vengeful spirit of Vincent Matthews and finding a resolution through forgiveness.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Case and Sentencing
sub_scenes.description: The arc begins with Dr. Styx involved in a violent act and then shifts to Vincent Matthews' sentencing for murder, setting up the haunted estate mystery.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup's Investigation Begins
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Styx enlists Henry Northrup to investigate the haunted Matthews estate, leading Northrup to arrive at the ominous location.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent's Ghost
sub_scenes.description: Inside the house, Northrup confronts the ghostly Vincent Matthews, leading to a physical and verbal battle.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution through Forgiveness
sub_scenes.description: A cloaked figure intervenes, guiding Vincent towards salvation by requiring forgiveness from his murdered sister, Rosalind.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of the Murdered Sister
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the tragic voyages of Henry Hudson in search of the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his unknown fate.

sub_scenes.title: Setting Sail and Initial Discontent
sub_scenes.description: The arc introduces Henry Hudson and his mission for the Dutch East India Company, followed by the crew's early dissatisfaction during the voyage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: Hudson's second voyage takes a northerly route, leading to the ship being icebound and ultimately to a full-scale mutiny by the crew.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight vs. Kurgan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the Arabian Knight, Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tatar leader Kurgan, involving infiltration, combat, and an honorable resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing and Desert Journey
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is tasked by the Caliph to rescue a kidnapped daughter, setting off on a perilous journey into Tatar territory.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Rescue Attempt
sub_scenes.description: Hassan approaches the Tartar camp, infiltrates it using disguise, and attempts to make contact with the captive.

sub_scenes.title: Challenge and Honorable Victory
sub_scenes.description: Captured, Hassan faces Kurgan, is challenged to combat, negotiates terms, and prepares for a desperate fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win
Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and Romantic Reward
sub_scenes.description: Hassan is honored by Kurgan, expresses humility to the rescued woman, and receives a kiss as a reward before their journey continues.

narrative_arcs.title: Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
